tasks.task: Adjusting tire air pressure and ballast on a tractor for proper slip percentage during a demo.
subtasks: Determine the desired slip percentage (2-4%) for the demo setup.
Check and adjust air pressure in tires to ensure proper inflation, noting the goal of three bars on the ground at the back.
Check and adjust ballast (weights) on the tractor for proper balance and performance, including weights on the front and inner duals.
